cards.title: Card description in main json file
cards.description: You can describe a card in the main json file (here).

cards.title: Direct link to card description
cards.description: You can describe a card in a spearate json file that is linked from within the main json file. The fields from the linked card description will overwrite the ones given here. You don't need to give any other fields than 'link' unless you want to.

cards.title: Link to package
cards.description: If you are working with packages, you can just link to the package directory. usm.io will automatically load 'card.json' from there.
